text: Flachsee is an artificial lake on the Reuss at Rottenschwil, south of Bremgarten in the Aargau region of Switzerland. The reservoir was formed after the construction of the dam in 1975 at Bremgarten-Zufikon. The lake's surface area is . ==See also== *List of lakes of Switzerland ==External links== * description of lake and nature reserve Category:Lakes of Aargau Category:Reservoirs in Switzerland RFlachsee
title: Flachsee
